Topic.Title: How do I add images into a game for offline use?

Posts.EditableText: I intend to make some bite sized text adventures to give out for free. How do I place an image in the game while it is offline like some of the classic text adventure games for the Apple 2 or Commodore 64? If someone could give me something to just copy and paste in to Squiffy's desktop version that would be super helpful.

Posts.EditableText:
Here's a step-by-step guide: https://www.w3schools.com/tags/tag_img.asp

Put the images you want into the same folder as the Squiffy files. 

But note, the photo **<u>will not**</u> appear in the squiffy editor when you click "Build." It will only appear in the browser.
